channel.title: Future Mobs
channel.description:
Post here you future mob ideas
i have a few thoughts.
inb4anythingfromothergames/movies/shows
1. posinous spiders.
2. trapdoor spiders
3. birds.
wikipedia has some info on this as well [url=http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Mobs]http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Mobs[/url] for the article go here ^

item.title: Future Mobs
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Hmm alright, but I’d still like it if it had a special drop. And make the spread rate a bit higher.

Read full topic

item.title: Future Mobs
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:34, topic:383972”]No drops? D:
If something like that could be set up as a trap… Would look pretty awesome[/quote]

The tree itself isn’t a mob, just the leaves that are doing it. I don’t how it would be coded if its a mob or not, or if the leaves would be coded to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Future Mobs
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

No drops? D:
If something like that could be set up as a trap… Would look pretty awesome

item.title: Future Mobs
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:32, topic:383972”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=479731.msg3514136#msg3514136 date=1298823999]

Moles. Those little fuckers would pop up, take a random item from your inventory, then run away. Occasionally, they will just pop up, then go back down. Item is only stolen if you are on the block they come out of. It only takes one hit to kill them. If they have ur item, they won’t go underground until 50 blocks away. The item they take will be the one in your hand. If it is stacked, they will steal one of them. They spawn inside of random dirt / grass blocks. Hitting them drops mole skin, which can be used to make an armor inbetween the strength of leather and iron, better then gold.

Fuck no… imagine holding diamond sword with that…

Not to mention the annoying underground tunnels they would probably make.

No no they dont make tunnels, they are part of the dirt block itself…
And say u had a diamond sword. Just chase it down, hit it once, and ur item is back.

How about stone giants? Or maybe stone… walkers.
Stone walkers are in caves, blending in with the stone. If you walk by them due to not noticing or simply walking by, nothing happens. Attempting to mine them will make them come off the wall and attack you. They have a 1.5 second delay of coming off the wall and are rather slow, so running or logging out could save your ass. They can be noticed, however, as every 5 seconds, their eyes will make a slight twinkle, just enough to let you know to not mine there. Killing them has a 100% chance of 1-64 stone, a 20% chance of 1-32 coal, 10% of 1-16 iron, 5% chance of 1-4 gold, 2% chance of 4-16 lapis, and a 1% chance of 1-2 diamonds.
[/quote]
Cool idea[/quote]

Thanks.
Not to jack rs on this next idea, but some evil trees would be cool.
However, rather then simply bashing you repeatedly, the leaves on them slowly grow lower and lower, until after 15-20 seconds, you’re surrounded by leaves and are slowly suffocating. Best way would be to cut through the leaves beforee your surrounded. No special drops, 1% chance of a tree doing this to you.

Read full topic

How about stone giants? Or maybe stone… walkers.
Stone walkers are in caves, blending in with the stone. If you walk by them due to not noticing or simply walking by, nothing happens. Attempting to mine them will make them come off the wall and attack you. They have a 1.5 second delay of coming off the wall and are rather slow, so running or logging out could save your ass. They can be noticed, however, as every 5 seconds, their eyes will make a slight twinkle, just enough to let you know to not mine there. Killing them has a 100% chance of 1-64 stone, a 20% chance of 1-32 coal, 10% of 1-16 iron, 5% chance of 1-4 gold, 2% chance of 4-16 lapis, and a 1% chance of 1-2 diamonds.[/quote]

item.title: Future Mobs
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

cane:

I would prefer to see other NPC players that you can obtain quests from, which could be from entering a cave and and taking the loot from a chest which is surrounded by mobs to collecting resources for them. I believe that would make the game 99x better

How do NPC’s appear in caves when caves are randomly generated?

@OP: Poisonous spiders? Now that would be a pain D: spiders pwn enough anyway with their wall climbing abilities but add poison and the whole world will end

item.title: Future Mobs
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Logitek, post:15, topic:383972”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=479731.msg3512491#msg3512491 date=1298688406]
I think we could use a pet or 2 actually (not the mod though, i mean naturally), like use a porkchop on a dog to tame him, he can assist you in diging. The ‘tame’ period will last for 10 minutes, and you can give him a bone to raise this by 30-60 seconds.

Actually, this sounds like a decent idea for someone to make a mod for
[/quote]

pet creepers[/quote]
Lmfao, that would suck if you forgot to feed em. Be building your house one minute, you turn around not thinking about it. SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS

Read full topic
